Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
I feel safe on my campus.
Gateway offers an array of clubs and events on campus.
Gateway is great for first year college students and students seeking a quality education that can't afford University prices.

Gateway offers high quality education and great students services at an amazing fee in comparison with Universities. I would recommend that new college students get their feet wet at Gateway before transferring to a University.

Gateway holds many events for students to get involved and have fun educational experience. They have many cultural events with food and music on campus as well as off campus trips to the theaters and exhibits. Events are promoted via student email/flyer/poster on campus and students can also visit the student life office to see what happening.

The dinning is not what you expect from a 5 star restaurant but the Gecko cafe offers many options like sandwich station, grill, sushi, papa johns pizza, salad bar, and a large variety of snacks/drinks. There are also many close available options off of campus if students wish to dine out.
I reside off campus with family.

Classes are not easy nor are they hard with the right professor. The professors I have had thus far have done a tremendous job by engaging and challenging the students while maintaining a close watch to ensure we are comprehending the material.

Get involved with campus activities and clubs. They have so many fun events toi enhance your educational experience and help you to network with our future workforce. Students should take advantage and seek out these amazing opportunities.

Gateway is an amazing college that offers so many opportunities to their students to flourish. I transferred from Yavapai College in fall 2013 and I am so glad I did. At Gateway I have received great advisement, great professors and quality education. I would recommend Gateway to anyone seeking a quality college education.

Get there early, for better parking. In three sentences This is the best community college I have ever attended. The teachers are amazing and full of enthusiasm, which is refreshing. Also, the campus is extremely clean and I have always found a parking spot.
